columns.name: art_work_id
columns.description: ID of the art work involved in the transaction.

columns.name: prev_code
columns.description: Code of the previous transaction in the chain.

columns.name: from_party
columns.description: Party that the art work was transferred from (e.g. "John Doe").

columns.name: to_party
columns.description: Party that the art work was transferred to (e.g. "Jane Doe").

columns.name: kind
columns.description: Type or kind of the transaction (e.g. "Purchase").
